snippet: Each Major League Soccer team will receive $500,000 in additional money over the next five years to spend on players.
abstract: Major League Soccer says each team will receive $500,000 in additional money for next five years to spend on players.
lead_paragraph: Each Major League Soccer team will receive $500,000 in additional money over the next five years to spend on players.

headline.main: Cash Influx for Major League Soccer Players
